mainText: One can  hope our necessity to achieve in every way will grow as fast as the vision of Steve Jobs. If so we will always be amazed by what we have available to address our needs and desires.  Thank you Mr. Jobs, technological genius, maybe one of the  contributing architects of our future utopia, a man with a dream and the drive to make it a reality.  Your achievement will be a highlight in the annals of our History.
author: Jonathan
